sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘bdtaskchatbot’
  3. Activate bdtaskchatbot from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download bdtaskchatbot Plugin.
  2. Upload the ‘Bdtaskchatbot’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate Bdtask ‘Bdtaskchatbot’ from your Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Bdtaskchatbot questions

How do I install bdtaskchatbot?

[Installation instructions can be found here.]

Using the WordPress Plugin Search

  1. Navigate to the Add New Plugins admin page.
  2. Search for bdtaskchatbot directory.
  3. The plugin should be listed first in the search results.
  4. Click the Install Now link.
  5. Lastly click the Activate Plugin link to activate the plugin.
